title: Sinful Doors!
description: It is a compelling paradox that while alive, how we journey matters more than our destination, but when we die, does it matter how we go, or is it only about where we reach. The only fact we know for sure is that when we die, those who love us will miss us, but what will happen to us?. Living has always been a whirlpool of motion, change and unanswered questions, in this book the author Chirag, attempts to imagine an ever changing and upgrading afterlife. He tries to explore its purpose and history, in a light and amusing banter involving people, who have reached afterlife on diverse paths. This book is a work of author's imagination intended not as a source of belief, but of hope, to comfort those of us, left behind wondering â€¦.
